question: Now a days district mineral foundations (DMF) is in news, Read the following and find the statement which is not true about DMF? 1. It was instituted under the Mines and Minerals (Development and Regulation) (MMDR) Amendment Act 2017. 2.It work for the interest of the benefit of the persons and areas affected mining related operations prescribed by the state govt. 3.The manner of operation comes under the jurisdiction of the State Govt.
explanation: DMF was situated for the interest of local persons. All the respective state have all the power to operate. It comes under the Mines and Minerals (Development and Regulation) (MMDR) Amendment Act 2015.
